程序包 mybank

类 MyBank

  • java.lang.Object
    • mybank.MyBank
  • public class MyBank
extends java.lang.Object
    class MyBank This class is the CUI interface and controls the service flow.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void Administrator1()
      Method Administrator1() This method is used to enter the interface to input administrator's secret key.
      void Administrator2()
      Method Administrator2() This method is used to enter administrator interface and do further operations.
      void Change​(Account acc)
      Method Change() This method is used for user to change his pin.
      void Checkinfo()
      Method Checkinfo() This method is user for an administrator to check information of a particular user given by the administrator.
      void Clear()
      Method Clear() This method is used for an administrator to clear funds of a particular user given by the administrator.
      void Close​(Account acc)
      Method Close() This method is used for a user to close his account and delete his user file.
      void CreateAccount()
      method CreateAccount Use this method to open an account, people enter the information then an account will be given and a txt file will be created.
      void Delete()
      Method Delete() This method is used for an administrator to delete account and user file of a user who doesn't have a good credit.
      void Deposit​(Account acc)
      Method Deposit() This method is used to deposit money to the account given by a user
      void Interface()
      method Interface() Use this method to enter CUI interface(home page), then choose operation.
      void Login1()
      Method Login1() This method is used to enter the interface to input account number and pin
      void Login2​(Account acc)
      Method Login2() This method is used to enter the interface of choosing operations after login
      void Lookup​(Account acc)
      Method Lookup() This method is used for a user to check balance, unclear money, state of account in the user file.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readFile​(java.io.File file)
      Method readFile() This method is used to read the account file to an arraylist and memorize the content in the memory.
      void Recover​(Account acc)
      Method Recover() This method is used to recover state of account from suspend state to active state.
      Account setAcc​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list)
      Method setAcc() This method set content of account into an arraylist in the memory with the help of content read.
      void Suspend​(Account acc)
      Method Suspend() This method is used for a user who wants to suspend the account.
      void Withdraw​(Account acc)
      Method Withdraw() This method is used for a user to withdraw money from his account.
      void writeFile​(Account acct)
      Method wirteFile This method generate file from the arraylist of account memorized in the memory.

        Method setAcc() This method set content of account into an arraylist in the memory with the help of content read.

        返回:

      • readFile

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readFile​(java.io.File file)
        Method readFile() This method is used to read the account file to an arraylist and memorize the content in the memory.
        参数:
        file -
        返回:
        list

      • Suspend

        public void Suspend​(Account acc)
        Method Suspend() This method is used for a user who wants to suspend the account. After this operation, no further transactions can be finished.
        参数:
        acc -

      • Recover

        public void Recover​(Account acc)
        Method Recover() This method is used to recover state of account from suspend state to active state. Then further transactions can be done.
        参数:
        acc -

      • Change

        public void Change​(Account acc)
        Method Change() This method is used for user to change his pin.
        参数:
        acc -

      • Close

        public void Close​(Account acc)
        Method Close() This method is used for a user to close his account and delete his user file.
        参数:
        acc -

        Method Clear() This method is used for an administrator to clear funds of a particular user given by the administrator.

        public void Delete()
        Method Delete() This method is used for an administrator to delete account and user file of a user who doesn't have a good credit.
